subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Mason Van Noort highlighted a four-run rally in the sixth inning with a tie-breaking homer to help Pearland, Tex., beat Auburn, Wash., 7-5, on Thursday to advance to the United States final of the Little League World Series.
snippet: Mason Van Noort highlighted a four-run rally in the sixth inning with a tie-breaking homer to help Pearland, Tex., beat Auburn, Wash., 7-5, on Thursday to advance to the United States final of the Little League World Series.
